ETYMOLOGY: From Medieval Latin plenarius, derived from Latin plenus ('full').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Attended by all members, especially of a conference or assembly; relating to a full assembly.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 全体出席的；全体会议的（尤指会议或议会）。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The committee presented its findings to the plenary session.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 委员会向全体会议提交了调查结果。

MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The diplomat was given plenary power to negotiate the terms.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这位外交官被授予了谈判条款的全部权力。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A session or meeting attended by all members of a body or conference.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The discussion will continue after the morning plenary.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 讨论将在上午的全体会议之后继续。

REGISTER: Formal, Official (especially in political or organizational contexts)
